0.2.name: wordpress/pixelpost-widget
0.2.description: This widget will display some random images from your pixelpost blog. The images are displayed on the sidebar of your Wordpress blog. The widget displays thumbnails, and clicking on a thumbnail will take the visitor to the pixelpost page for that picture. This version has been written for Wordpress 2.8, if you have an older version of Wordpress installes, please use version 0.3 of this widget instead.
